verses.verse: And God <S%H430><s%> remembered <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853><s%> Noah, <S%H5146><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> living thing, <S%H2416><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the cattle <S%H929><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was with <S%H854><s%> him in the ark: <S%H8392><s%> and God <S%H430><s%> made a wind <S%H7307><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> assuaged; <S%H7918><s%>

The fountains <S%H4599><s%> also of the deep <S%H8415><s%> and the windows <S%H699><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%> were stopped, <S%H5534><s%> and the rain <S%H1653><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> was restrained; <S%H3607><s%>

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> continually: <S%H1980><s%> <S%H7725><s%> and after the end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7097><s%> of the hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were abated. <S%H2637><s%>

And the ark <S%H8392><s%> rested <S%H5117><s%> in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the seventeenth <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%> of Ararat. <S%H780><s%>

And the waters <S%H4325><s%> decreased <S%H2637><s%> continually <S%H1961><s%> <S%H1980><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month: <S%H2320><s%> in the tenth <S%H6224><s%> month, on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> were the tops <S%H7218><s%> of the mountains <S%H2022><s%> seen. <S%H7200><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> at the end <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7093><s%> of forty <S%H705><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> that Noah <S%H5146><s%> opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H853><s%> the window <S%H2474><s%> of the ark <S%H8392><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he had made: <S%H6213><s%>

And he sent forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> a raven, <S%H6158><s%> which went forth <S%H3318><s%> to and fro, <S%H3318><s%> <S%H7725><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were dried up <S%H3001><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Also he sent forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> a dove <S%H3123><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> him, to see <S%H7200><s%> if the waters <S%H4325><s%> were abated <S%H7043><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground; <S%H127><s%>

But the dove <S%H3123><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> rest <S%H4494><s%> for the sole <S%H3709><s%> of her foot, <S%H7272><s%> and she returned <S%H7725><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him into <S%H413><s%> the ark, <S%H8392><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were on <S%H5921><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth: <S%H776><s%> then he put forth <S%H7971><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> her, and pulled her in <S%H935><s%> <S%H853><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him into <S%H413><s%> the ark. <S%H8392><s%>

And he stayed <S%H2342><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> other <S%H312><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and again <S%H3254><s%> he sent forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> the dove <S%H3123><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the ark; <S%H8392><s%>

And the dove <S%H3123><s%> came in <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> him in <S%H6256><s%> the evening; <S%H6153><s%> and, lo, <S%H2009><s%> in her mouth <S%H6310><s%> was an olive <S%H2132><s%> leaf <S%H5929><s%> plucked off: <S%H2965><s%> so Noah <S%H5146><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were abated <S%H7043><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And he stayed <S%H3176><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> other <S%H312><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and sent forth <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> the dove; <S%H3123><s%> which returned <S%H7725><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him any more. <S%H5750><s%>

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> in the six <S%H8337><s%> hundredth <S%H3967><s%> and first <S%H259><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the first <S%H7223><s%> month, the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> were dried up <S%H2717><s%> from off <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%> and Noah <S%H5146><s%> removed <S%H5493><s%> <S%H853><s%> the covering <S%H4372><s%> of the ark, <S%H8392><s%> and looked, <S%H7200><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the ground <S%H127><s%> was dry. <S%H2717><s%>

And in the second <S%H8145><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> on the seven <S%H7651><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> was the earth <S%H776><s%> dried. <S%H3001><s%>
And God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Noah, <S%H5146><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Go forth <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H4480><s%> the ark, <S%H8392><s%> thou, <S%H859><s%> and thy wife, <S%H802><s%> and thy sons, <S%H1121><s%> and thy sons' <S%H1121><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee.

Bring forth <S%H3318><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee every <S%H3605><s%> living thing <S%H2416><s%> that <S%H834><s%> is with <S%H854><s%> thee, of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> both of fowl, <S%H5775><s%> and of cattle, <S%H929><s%> and of every <S%H3605><s%> creeping thing <S%H7431><s%> that creepeth <S%H7430><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth; <S%H776><s%> that they may breed abundantly <S%H8317><s%> in the earth, <S%H776><s%> and be fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and multiply <S%H7235><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
And Noah <S%H5146><s%> went forth, <S%H3318><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and his wife, <S%H802><s%> and his sons' <S%H1121><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> with <S%H854><s%> him:

Every <S%H3605><s%> beast, <S%H2416><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> creeping thing, <S%H7431><s%> and every <S%H3605><s%> fowl, <S%H5775><s%> and whatsoever <S%H3605><s%> creepeth <S%H7430><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> after their kinds, <S%H4940><s%> went forth <S%H3318><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> the ark. <S%H8392><s%>

And Noah <S%H5146><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> unto the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> of every <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> and of every <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> clean <S%H2889><s%> fowl, <S%H5775><s%> and offered <S%H5927><s%> burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> smelled <S%H7306><s%> a sweet <S%H5207><s%> <S%H853><s%> savor; <S%H7381><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> in <S%H413><s%> his heart, <S%H3820><s%> I will not <S%H3808><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> curse <S%H7043><s%> <S%H853><s%> the ground <S%H127><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> for man's sake; <S%H5668><s%> <S%H120><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the imagination <S%H3336><s%> of man's <S%H120><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> is evil <S%H7451><s%> from his youth; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5271><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will I again <S%H3254><s%> smite <S%H5221><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> <S%H853><s%> every thing <S%H3605><s%> living, <S%H2416><s%> as <S%H834><s%> I have done. <S%H6213><s%>

While <S%H5750><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> remaineth, <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> seedtime <S%H2233><s%> and harvest, <S%H7105><s%> and cold <S%H7120><s%> and heat, <S%H2527><s%> and summer <S%H7019><s%> and winter, <S%H2779><s%> and day <S%H3117><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%> shall not <S%H3808><s%> cease. <S%H7673><s%>
